title: Optimization of Energy Efficiency for Federated Learning over IRS-assisted Cell-free Massive MIMO Networks
excerpt: This paper explores the optimization of energy efficiency for federated learning in an intelligent reflecting surface (IRS)-assisted cell-free massive MIMO network.
citation: Dang, X.-T., Nguyen, H. V., & Shin, O.-S. (2025). "Optimization of Energy Efficiency for Federated Learning over IRS-assisted Cell-free Massive MIMO Networks." IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications.

title: Optimizing Energy Efficiency for Federated Learning in Rotary-Wing UAV Air-to-Ground Communications
venue: IEEE Transactions on Green Communications and Networking
excerpt: Focuses on enhancing the energy efficiency of federated learning systems utilizing rotary-wing unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) for air-to-ground communication.
citation: Dang, X.-T., Nguyen, Q.-S., & Shin, O.-S. (2025). "Optimizing Energy Efficiency for Federated Learning in Rotary-Wing UAV Air-to-Ground Communications." IEEE Transactions on Green Communications and Networking.

title: A DDPG-LSTM Framework for Optimizing UAV-Enabled Integrated Sensing and Communication
excerpt: Presents a framework combining Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient (DDPG) and Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks to optimize Integrated Sensing and Communication (ISC) systems enabled by UAVs.
citation: Dang, X.-T., Eom, J.-S., Vu, B.-M., & Shin, O.-S. (2025). "A DDPG-LSTM Framework for Optimizing UAV-Enabled Integrated Sensing and Communication." Drones, 9(8), 548.

title: Combining the Viterbi Algorithm and Graph Neural Networks for Efficient MIMO Detection
excerpt: Investigates a novel method for efficient Multiple-Input Multiple-Output (MIMO) detection by integrating the Viterbi algorithm with Graph Neural Networks (GNNs).
citation: Nguyen, T. A., Dang, X.-T., Shin, O.-S., & Lee, J. (2025). "Combining the Viterbi Algorithm and Graph Neural Networks for Efficient MIMO Detection." Electronics, 14(9), 1698.

title: Physical Layer Security for IRS-UAV-Assisted Cell-Free Massive MIMO Systems
excerpt: Analyzes and enhances physical layer security in cell-free massive MIMO systems assisted by both intelligent reflecting surfaces (IRS) and unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs).
citation: Dang, X.-T., Nguyen, H. V., & Shin, O.-S. (2024). "Physical Layer Security for IRS-UAV-Assisted Cell-Free Massive MIMO Systems." IEEE Access.

title: A Survey on Energy-Efficient Design for Federated Learning over Wireless Networks
excerpt: A comprehensive review detailing the current state-of-the-art and challenges in designing energy-efficient federated learning protocols for wireless communication networks.
citation: Dang, X.-T., Vu, B.-M., Nguyen, Q.-S., Tran, T.-T.-M., Eom, J.-S., & Shin, O.-S. (2024). "A Survey on Energy-Efficient Design for Federated Learning over Wireless Networks." Energies, 17(24), 6485.

title: Optimization of Energy Efficiency for Federated Learning over Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Communication Networks
excerpt: Focuses on optimizing the energy efficiency of federated learning implementations in communication networks supported by Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs).
citation: Dang, X.-T., & Shin, O.-S. (2024). "Optimization of Energy Efficiency for Federated Learning over Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Communication Networks." Electronics, 13(10), 1827.

title: Optimization of IRS-NOMA-Assisted Cell-Free Massive MIMO Systems Using Deep Reinforcement Learning
excerpt: Applies Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) to optimize the performance of intelligent reflecting surface (IRS) and NOMA-assisted cell-free massive MIMO systems.
citation: Dang, X.-T., Nguyen, H. V., & Shin, O.-S. (2023). "Optimization of IRS-NOMA-Assisted Cell-Free Massive MIMO Systems Using Deep Reinforcement Learning." IEEE Access.

title: Optimal User Pairing Approach for NOMA-Based Cell-Free Massive MIMO Systems
excerpt: Proposes an optimal user pairing approach for Non-Orthogonal Multiple Access (NOMA) integration into Cell-Free Massive MIMO systems to maximize sum spectral efficiency.
citation: Dang, X.-T., Le, M. T. P., Nguyen, H. V., Chatzinotas, S., & Shin, O.-S. (2023). "Optimal User Pairing Approach for NOMA-Based Cell-Free Massive MIMO Systems." IEEE Transactions on Vehicular Technology, 72(4), 4751-4765.
